definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: Our guests, no matter where you come from, please make yourself at home.
sentences.chinese: 不管遠近都是客人，請不用客氣。

sentences.english: The little restaurant is known to all locally.
sentences.chinese: 這家小餐館在當地遠近聞名。

sentences.english: Fujian lacquerware is known far and wide.
The school is widely admired for its excellent teaching.
sentences.chinese: 這所學校教學優秀，遠近稱譽。

sentences.english: The images of electric and magnetic field of different polarizations in the near to far field.
sentences.chinese: 電流源陣列不同極向電磁場之影像在遠近場中之變化。

sentences.english: Multiple access interference cause seriously near-far impact.
sentences.chinese: 多址干擾引發嚴重的遠近問題。

sentences.english: The performance comparison under the effects of near-far is also investigated.
sentences.chinese: 作了在有遠近效應情況下的性能比較。

sentences.english: Li Fucai was sinister and sensuous. He was the cruelest man around.
sentences.chinese: 李富財陰險調皮，並且但願享受，是遠近最暴虐的人。

sentences.english: The village became a real stand-out.
sentences.chinese: 這個村子後來成爲了遠近聞名的模範村。

sentences.english: From near and far reporters streamed to interview Rontgen .
sentences.chinese: 遠近四方的記者蜂擁而至，採訪倫琴。

sentences.english: There's also a power button, shutter release, and zoom slider up top -- all pretty standard stuff.
sentences.chinese: 頂部上有一個電源按鍵，快門按鍵，鏡頭遠近調焦鍵。

sentences.english: A uniform fare of ten dollars for any distance.
sentences.chinese: 不論遠近車費一律拾元。

sentences.english: Chinese ancients said, without knowing each other near and far, thousands of miles apart.
sentences.chinese: 中國古人說，相知無遠近，萬里尚爲鄰。

sentences.english: This educate is update to its excellent teaching.
sentences.chinese: 這所清華教授優秀，遠近馳名。

sentences.english: Intrinsic carpal ligaments exist between the carpal bone in the proximal or distal rows.
sentences.chinese: 腕關節內源性韌帶分佈於遠近兩排腕骨之間。

sentences.english: Li said "distance cannot separate true friends who feel so close even when they are thousands of miles apart".
sentences.chinese: 李肇星說，“相知無遠近，萬里尚爲鄰”。

definition: deep or shallow/depth (of the sea)/limits of decorum
length/duration/accident/right and wrong/good and bad/long and short
what is true and what is false/(to get to know) the real situation
to turn upside down/to reverse/back to front/confused/deranged/crazy

lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
to transform/to convert/to vary/to alternate/a transformation
